channel.title: [wL]: SomeServ v1. Simply Followed Anthony's Post
channel.description:
[url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/pnwguq]http://www.sendspace.com/file/pnwguq[/url]
A Winterlove server base for those to lazy to improve most of the worst options about current wL servers. no pictures required as it does nothing but login.
I feel that it follows conventions, its packaged. client.java source has been cleaned slightly.
A small note to many server developers... you can still easily add all the handlers like old winterlove servers, this is just non-threaded and has an event manager in proposal to the process() method.
With many of the servers out there it would probably be about 10 minutes work to add everything on your current server to this base. [b]But I don't recommend it[/b].
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
30% Winterlove, Daiki - For creating the base. 50% Graham - For the Event Manager, Instancing and Non-Threading Source Code. 20% SmartWork - For putting it together, Packaging existing source and cleaning client.java.
